title: Let This Sexy Shirtless Marine Serenade You: VIDEO
content:
A crooning, muscular and often shirtless U.S. Marine is creating some serious thirst on the internet.

Jaxon McClure recently asked a celebrity (pop singer Tori Kelly) to be his date to the Marine Corps ball, following in the footsteps of gay marine Tanner White, who successfully wooed Steve Grand to be his date to the ball. To tempt Kelly, he posted the traditional video pitch…


…and also crooned his heart out, covering Brian McKnight’s “Back at One.”


Since being posted, it has been viewed over 9 million times on Facebook and retweeted more than 5,000 times.

But Jaxon’s crooning is not new, as careful examination of his Instagram account proves. He is apparently a fan of out gay singer Sam Smith.



Of course, when perusing his Instagram, we couldn’t help but notice a few other finds worth sharing. Check out Jaxon’s hottest moments on Instagram, below:























[h/t Gaily Grind]
